contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 4, 1979 D Hammersmith Contest (Second Division)
Hammersmith Contest (Second Division) 20 Test Piece Contest Hammersmith Contest hammersmith-contest-second-division
Hammersmith Town Hall, Hammersmith, Hammersmith and Fulham, Greater London, England, UK Above order taken from British Bandsman 10/02/1979. Original programme has 1 and 2 points and placings reversed. A second original programme (from an ex-City of Oxford player, with pieces and performance annotations for the section) clears up the confusion - BB order is correct, and the draw order is also reversed - suspect the first programme wrote down Romford and City of Oxford the wrong way round from the draw, and the error propagated through to the results.
Oct. 3, 2013, 12:33 p.m. Nov. 29, 2020, 10:05 a.m.
1 City of Oxford Silver Band Don Keene Labour and Love
2 Romford William Jarrett Essay [Gregson]
3 Welwyn Garden City Band David Baron Rhapsody in Brass
4 Kennington (Oxford) Ron Sudworth Promenade
Unknown Result Enfield Brass Band T. Platts Prince Igor Overture
Unknown Result Coventry Imperial Geoffrey Barber Rhapsody in Brass
Unknown Result Bedworth Silver Prize Band Phil Lewsey Tournament for Brass
Unknown Result The Egham Band Michael Worthington Othello
Unknown Result Harlow Brass A. Moore
Unknown Result Fulham Brass Band Cecil Exton First Suite in Eb [arr. Herbert]
Unknown Result Epsom & Ewell Silver Band Alex Warne Scheherazade
Unknown Result London Co-op Forest Stephen Atkins Promenade
